title: Dodges Should Not Cause Team Changes
body:
Is there any way it could be coded in so that stay the same after a dodge if everyone accepts?

Occasionally, the same 9 players will get reshuffled around different teams after a dodge. This leads to teams knowing what other players want to play so that they can ban them out in turn, leading to an unfair advantage.

RNG is so unkind.
